content: pixel sleeve stinkiem yb nrettap gnittink-dnah a mei knits information the pixel sleeve the pixel sleeve is a chunky knit laptop case designed to keep your tech cozy worked in the round from the bottom up the body of the sleeve is simple stockinette it s quick to knit and easy to customize once you ve reached the length of your laptop half the stitches are bound off and the rest are worked flat to create a clean flap with two buttonholes finish it off by seaming the bottom closed and adding a button of your choice for a soft functional finish difficulty level abbreviations confident beginner st stitch materials r round/row yarn approx 150 yards 137 m super bulky k knit yarn the sample used malabrigo rasta 90y 82 p purl m per 150g skein in the color apple green you can also use multiple strands m marker of scrap yarn held together as long as you meet gauge rs right side of the work/ the outside facing portion of the work gauge ws wrong side of the work/ the inside of 10 stitches × 16 row = 10 × 10 cm 4 × 4 the work inches in stockinette stitch using 6mm needles k2tog knit two together be sure to check your gauge if your gauge is off your sleeve may not fit yo yarn over -
